text: Joseph Hamilton (August 28, 1938 â€“ August 3, 2021) was an American professional wrestler, promoter, and trainer. He was best known as one half of the tag team The Assassins where he was called "Assassin #1". He was born in St. Joseph, Missouri. In the late 1980s, Hamilton founded Deep South Wrestling (DSW). Hamilton died under hospice care on August 3, 2021 in Georgia, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:People from St. Joseph, Missouri Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Sportspeople from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Jody Hamilton
